Trigger.Name: Ready check complete - Not Ready

Trigger.Name: Ready check complete - Ready
Trigger.RegularExpression: Ready check complete. Ready: (?<readyCount>[0-9]+)/(?<totalCount>[0-9]+) Not Ready: (?<notReadyCount>[0-9]+)/([0-9]+)

Trigger.Name: Ready check started
Trigger.RegularExpression: (has initiated|You have commenced) a ready check.
